definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
to shake/to vibrate/to jolt/to quake/excited/shocked/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing thunder/☳

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Guo2 jia1 di4 zhen4 ju2

definition: medium depth earthquake (with epicenter 70-300 km deep)

sentences.english: The geology effect of 3-D seismic exploration in HK area, Jianghan region is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要介绍江汉HK地区三维地震勘探的地质效果。

sentences.english: Metsamor lies on some of Earth's most earthquake-prone terrain.
sentences.chinese: Metsamor核电站位于地球上地震多发的地带。

sentences.english: The zero-offset (z0) section is an important achievement in seismic reflection imaging.
sentences.chinese: 零炮检距剖面是地震反射成像过程中的重要成果。

sentences.english: The government already has started planning a three-year rebuilding effort for the areas damaged by the earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 政府已开始针对地震灾区制定为期三年的重建计划。

sentences.english: Her behavior returned to normal after the quake.
sentences.chinese: 她的举止在地震结束后就恢复了正常。

sentences.english: A seismic trace calculated from well -log data is called a synthetic seismogram.
sentences.chinese: 由测井资料计算出来的地震记录道称为合成地震记录。

sentences.english: A seismic trace calculated from well -log data is called a synthetic seismogram.
sentences.chinese: 由测井资料计算出来的地震记录道称为合成地震记录。

sentences.english: And then all this earthquake happened, I thought, is that Karma?-when you are not nice that bad things happen to you.
sentences.chinese: 然后地震发生了，我当时就想，这难道是因果报应？

sentences.english: Seismosaurus had a long neck, a small head and a long thin tail.
sentences.chinese: 地震龙长着长脖子，小脑袋，以及一条细长的尾巴。

sentences.english: It has been mapped by using ground-penetrating radar and seismic tests.
sentences.chinese: 人们已经用探地雷达和地震测试把它绘制出来。

sentences.english: The earthquake stopped up many natural springs.
sentences.chinese: 地震堵塞了许多天然泉水。

sentences.english: In this paper, a method for calculating seismic vulnerability matrix of brick masonry structure is put forward.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出一种计算砖砌体结构地震易损性矩阵的方法。

sentences.english: Seismic phase analysis and identification are the basis of earthquake prediction and speed report.
sentences.chinese: 震相识别与分析是地震预报与速报的基础。

sentences.english: The great majority of earthquakes in this region occur beneath the northern portion of the embayment .
sentences.chinese: 这个地区的绝大多数地震都发生在该海湾北部的下面。

sentences.english: Major earthquakes in Guangxi occur in the areas where there is great difference between neotectonic movement.
sentences.chinese: 广西的地震主要发生在新构造差异运动较强的区域。

sentences.english: The newspapers called the earthquake an act of God.
sentences.chinese: 报纸上称那次地震为天灾。

definition: powerful earthquake/abbr. for 強烈地震|强烈地震
shallow earthquake (with epicenter less than 70 km deep)
